name: Playtest 2: Downstream
description: Downstream is a post-singularity civilization simulator currently in its early demo phase. Help Morton the superintelligent AI and a tribe of rodents rebuild the world out of goo. With an ever-growing list of options for expanding the game with new experiences, players must work together to create a thriving society.

speakers.name: Playmint
speakers.bio: Playmint is an onchain games studio, building category-defining games for the web3 era.
